text: When I Saw You (, translit. Lamma Shoftak) is a 2012 Palestinian Jordanian Greek United Arab Emirates drama movie directed by Annamarie Jacir and starring Saleh Bakri, Mahmoud Asfa, Ruba Blal, Ahmad Srour. ==Other websites== * Category:2012 drama movies Category:Palestinian movies Category:Jordanian movies Category:Greek movies Category:United Arab Emirates movies Category:Movies directed by Annamarie Jacir
title: When I Saw You (movie)
